alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 14 at 10:45AM CST until December 17 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Leflore and Carroll Counties. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yalobusha At Whaley. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Minor flooding of lowland and agricultural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this morning and will crest at 23.5 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Yalobusha Whaley 21.0 20.3 Wed 10 am CS 22.4 22.3 19.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM CST.
